mapper.select: select a.id id, s_code, name, sex, year(now()) - birthday age, class, phone, address, b.deptn dept, b.colln collage from (select * from student where user_id = #{id}) a join (select dept.id id, dept.name deptn, collage.name colln from dept join collage on dept.col_id = collage.id) as b on a.dept_id = b.id;

select grade, cr.c_name course, te.name teacherName from (select grade, cou_id, tea_id from stu_grade join teach_cou tc on stu_grade.teach_cou_id = tc.id where stu_id = #{id}) a join course cr on cr.id = cou_id join teacher te on te.id = a.tea_id;

select d.s_code code, course, grade, d.sex sex, dept.name dept, d.name name, collage.name collage from student d join (select b.stu_id code, c.c_name course, b.grade grade from (select id, cou_id from teach_cou where id = #{teaId}) a join stu_grade b on b.teach_cou_id = a.id join course c on c.id = a.cou_id) f on d.id = f.code join dept on dept.id = d.id join collage on dept.col_id = collage.id;
mapper.update: update stu_grade set grade = #{grade} where teach_cou_id = (select id from teach_cou where cou_id = (select id from course where c_name = #{cName}) and tea_id = #{teaId}) and stu_id = (select id from student where s_code = #{code});
mapper.select: select distinct t.name name,t.tea_id as id from teach_cou join teacher t on t.id = teach_cou.tea_id join ( select teach_cou_id from stu_grade where stu_id = (select id from student where user_id = #{id})) as sgtci on teach_cou.id = teach_cou_id
select distinct name,s.id as id from stu_grade join student s on s.id = stu_grade.stu_id where teach_cou_id in (select id from teach_cou where tea_id = (select id from teacher where tea_id = #{id}))
select message as word , type as name from conversation where tea_id = #{teaId} and stu_id = #{stuId};
